cardano-sl-0.4.3: Cardano SL main implementation

Safe HaskellNone
LanguageHaskell2010

Pos.WorkMode

Contents

  • Actual modes

Description

WorkMode constraint. It is widely used in almost every our code. Simple alias for bunch of useful constraints. This module also contains new monads to extend functional capabilities inside do-block.

Synopsis

  • type WorkMode ssc m = (MinWorkMode m, MonadMask m, MonadSlots m, MonadDB m, MonadDBLimits m, MonadTxpMem TxpExtra_TMP m, MonadRelayMem m, MonadDelegation m, MonadSscMem ssc m, MonadReportingMem m, SscGStateClass ssc, SscLocalDataClass ssc, SscHelpersClass ssc, WithNodeContext ssc m, HasContext LrcContext m, HasContext UpdateContext m, HasContext NodeParams m, HasContext UpdateParams m, MonadStats m, MonadJL m, WithPeerState m, MonadShutdownMem m)
  • type MinWorkMode m = (WithLogger m, MonadMockable m, MonadIO m, WithPeerState m)
  • type TxpExtra_TMP = ()
  • type ProductionMode ssc = NoStatsT (RawRealMode ssc)
  • type RawRealMode ssc = PeerStateHolder (DelegationT (TxpHolder TxpExtra_TMP (SscHolder ssc (NtpSlotting (SlottingHolder (DBHolder (ContextHolder ssc (LoggerNameBox Production))))))))
  • type ServiceMode = PeerStateHolder (LoggerNameBox Production)
  • type StatsMode ssc = StatsT (RawRealMode ssc)

Documentation

type WorkMode ssc m = (MinWorkMode m, MonadMask m, MonadSlots m, MonadDB m, MonadDBLimits m, MonadTxpMem TxpExtra_TMP m, MonadRelayMem m, MonadDelegation m, MonadSscMem ssc m, MonadReportingMem m, SscGStateClass ssc, SscLocalDataClass ssc, SscHelpersClass ssc, WithNodeContext ssc m, HasContext LrcContext m, HasContext UpdateContext m, HasContext NodeParams m, HasContext UpdateParams m, MonadStats m, MonadJL m, WithPeerState m, MonadShutdownMem m) Source #

Bunch of constraints to perform work for real world distributed system.

type MinWorkMode m = (WithLogger m, MonadMockable m, MonadIO m, WithPeerState m) Source #

More relaxed version of WorkMode.

type TxpExtra_TMP = () Source #

Actual modes

type ProductionMode ssc = NoStatsT (RawRealMode ssc) Source #

ProductionMode is an instance of WorkMode which is used (unsurprisingly) in production.

type RawRealMode ssc = PeerStateHolder (DelegationT (TxpHolder TxpExtra_TMP (SscHolder ssc (NtpSlotting (SlottingHolder (DBHolder (ContextHolder ssc (LoggerNameBox Production)))))))) Source #

RawRealMode is a basis for WorkModes used to really run system.

type ServiceMode = PeerStateHolder (LoggerNameBox Production) Source #

ServiceMode is the mode in which support nodes work.

type StatsMode ssc = StatsT (RawRealMode ssc) Source #

StatsMode is used for remote benchmarking.
